resources.string: We are not responsible for any damage caused by this application. You will not prosecute with this application at all.

I will install this backup.
 When installing this backup, the current version of Minecraft PE will be deleted.
 If you choosed ExternalStorage, you will not lost game datas.
 but if you choosed application, you will lost all game datas.
 step1 : uninstall MinecraftPE
 step2 : install MinecraftPE
